unit.name: Mycetic Spore
unit.notes: May transport a formation that consist exclusively of the following types of units: Termagants, Hormagaunts, Raveners, Biovores, any type of Carnifex, Hive Tyrant, Swarmlord, Dagon Overlord, Tyranid Warriors, Zoanthrope. No Shrikes of any type may be taken. After the Mycetic Spore lands, it attacks all enemy units within 15cm. Jeweils enemy formation attacked receives a BM für coming under fire, und an extra BM für jeweils casualty. Then transported formations set up within 5cm of the point the Mycetic Spore landed, oder within 5cm of another already disembarqued unit from the same formation (but a maximum of 15cm from the point where the Mycetic Spore landed).

unit.name: Razorfiend
unit.notes: May transport zwei Mycetic Spores including cargo.

unit.name: Hive Ship
specialRules: Slow to Arrive (May only arrive from turn 2 onwards), Transport
unit.notes: Darf drei Mycetic Spores including cargo.
